item.title: Overview
item.description: Thereâ€™s plenty of web benchmark tools around and it might be hard to pick one, and investing time into not-established tools is risky. Hyperfoil was not created for the pure joy of coding but as a solution to set of problems which could not be solved all by single other existing tool. Free software Free software allows you to take your benchmark and publish it for everyone to verify. With proprietary licenses that wouldn’t be so easy.
